name: Dungeon Stars
detailed_description:
Dungeon Stars is a mix of hack 'n' slash, RPG and endless runner.
Go deeper in the exciting dungeons levels from the multiple chapters to liberate your fellow heroes and collect gold, potions and loot to help you in your quest! Goblins will try to stop you, make sure you are well prepared before entering a star portal!

-Unlock overs 15 heroes with unique abilities
-Face warriors, rogues, brutes, wizards and much more goblin types
-Fight unique and challenging bosses
-Free the stars and send them back in the sky where they belong to complete constellations
-Liberate pet companions in the dungeons that will loyaly help you with their own skills
-Promote your heroes using components you will find in the dungeons that will make them even more awesome
-Collect Gems that will add helpful effects and try multiple combinations
-Unlock star portals and descend in unique and challenging dungeons

short_description: Dungeon Stars is an explosive evolution of a hack -n- slash dungeon crawler with addictive button-smashing action set in a world populated by lovable characters, a beautifully rich environment, and rapid progression.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Later
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
